Nov 6, 2019
"Depends where you are!"
Former Employee - Teller 
Doesn't Recommend
Neutral Outlook
No opinion of CEO
I worked at Wells Fargo full-time for less than a year
Pros
Get to learn new things!
Enjoyable team depends were you are!
Good banking options
Cons
Co-workers body shame plus size women!
Managers have favorites!
Lies to you and is never honest!
Advice to Management
Stop picking favorites and do your job! There are employees that would make your business run so much better but you have these rude ones that ruin your image
Helpful

Nov 6, 2019
"Needs improvement as a company"
Current Employee - Personal Banker in Columbia, SC
I have been working at Wells Fargo full-time for more than 5 years
Pros
Room for growth and advancement
Cons
Terrible management And favoritism is a real thing
Advice to Management
Stop treating adults like school children and stop favoritism
Helpful

Nov 5, 2019
"wouldn't recommend."
Current Employee - Customer Service Representative 
Doesn't Recommend
I have been working at Wells Fargo full-time
Pros
The Vacation days are Great! 180 hours your first year. Vacation and sick days are combined.
Cons
Working conditions are subpar, Branches are always understaffed and the recruitment process takes months. There is no clear differentiation between CSSR and Personal Bankers as far as work and experience. However, Personal Bankers make more money.
Advice to Management
Put your staff first!
Helpful

Nov 5, 2019
"Good company"
Current Employee - Client Associate 
I have been working at Wells Fargo full-time for more than 10 years
Pros
Gear benefits and 401k. The people are great as well and helpful. FAS are great too if you are matched with the right person.
Cons
Not much growth, base isnâ€™t high
Helpful
